subject: Re: eBook Idea
preview: Hi Heath,  Sorry final version attached (made some minor tweaks).  FYI I have edited the copy on both landing pages as well as the copy in the Mailchimp email template. So, we are good to test this ba

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Sorry final version attached (made some minor tweaks).

FYI I have edited the copy on both landing pages as well as the copy in the Mailchimp email template. So, we are good to test this baby out! Please let me know once you have attached the PDF to the download button (and the image) within the email and I will test it all out.

Once all has been tested, I will bring our social media girl Sabrina into the mix to turn it into a lead gen ad.

I know I've already mentioned it, but I'm finishing up on Friday so would love to get this up and running before I go on leave as I'm sure the eBook is something people can peruse over the holidays. No pressure!

Thanks so much!

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

attachments.filename: eBook - How to Style Your Home for Sale-3.pdf

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

This is all looking AMAZING and we are very excited!

Please find eBook attached.

Can we get a little pop up on the home page also, that then takes them to the landing page to fill in the form to receive the eBook. Otherwise, how else will they find this landing page? Or know there is an eBook to download (other than our FB lead gen advertising). Because you can't actually navigate to this landing page on our website organically, can you?

I am going to tweak the working on the landing pages if that's ok (I can do this myself in WordPress back end) and will also tweak the copy in the Mailchimp template. Will let you know once I've completed this.

Thanks so much.

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

attachments.filename: Huntley + Co eBook - Home to Style Your Home for Sale.pdf

full_threads.body:
Hi Brooke, 

So sorry for the delay, it has been a madhouse over here, meanwhile, you have literally written a book! Love your work!!

We are ready to get this happening for you though, check this video out:
https://www.loom.com/share/e239ae7a40fe4fd3b1876336f352dd89

Here is the landing page:
https://huntleyandco.com.au/e-book/

And here is the thank you page:
https://huntleyandco.com.au/your-ebook-is-ready

Please send through a copy of the eBook when you are ready, and I'll get it all hooked up and ready to go. We can then also double/triple test to make sure the details flow through into MailChimp as expected. 

Over to you :)

Hi There,

Just wanted to follow up on the below. We require assistance setting up an automation in Mailchimp where people get dumped into from the Facebook lead gen ad and then receive an email automatically that includes our eBook. Is this something you can help us with?

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

@heath I have created a page. I don't have the canva file yet. 

https://huntleyandco.com.au/e-book/

https://huntleyandco.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=118358&action=elementor#

Hi Joel,

Thanks so much, that would be great.

I've just finished up in a meeting with our social media company who will run a lead generation ad for us on Facebook where people fill in their details to receive a free copy of our eBook. They are proposing that we set up the automation in Mail Chimp so that when people fill in the online lead gen form, their details get automatically input into Mailchimp and from there they automatically receive an email from us with the eBook attached.

Can you please assist us with this? Heath has set up all our previous automated customer journeys so I would have no idea where to start with this. Apparently once the automation has been set up, we can integrate it with Facebook for the lead gen ad. Again, this is a whole other language to me but I'm hoping between you guys and our social media company (Latch Media Marketing - Sabrina) we can make this happen. I have included Sabrina in on this email.

Thanks so much.

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Brooke,

We currently working on this request. We will give you an update today/tomorrow.

- We will create a landing page with a signup form. 
- Create a popup that directs to the newly created landing page

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,


I have designed the below eBook and we would love to run a Facebook campaign where people fill in their details to receive a free copy of our eBook. Our social media company is looking after this side of things for us.


https://www.canva.com/design/DAFQw4GqsyM/F12S9WZnsgUtFBK9VB6G5Q/view?utm_content=DAFQw4GqsyM&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link&utm_source=homepage_design_menu


However, we would also love to do something similar to the below concept, where a little pop up of our eBook appears on our homepage and when you click on it, it takes you to a ghost page where you fill in your details to receive a copy of the eBook.


Pop Up:





Ghost Page:





I filled this form in using my private email and received the attached response. I am now in their database and receive all their EDM's which we would love to do also.


Is this something you can help us with?


Kind Regards,
Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER


E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
